task.title: Adjust the seat temperature
task.shortdesc: Everyone likes to have a seat at a setting that is most comfortable to them and the seat coolness or warmth is fully configurable.

context.p: There is a minimum and maximum defined by your administrator to ensure seats are not uncomfortable.

step.cmd: Launch your personal Primary Control dialog.
Adjust the temperature up or down.

result.p: The temperature blinks until the new setting is reached at which point the temperature remains steady.
